QuestData.Title: Avenge Furien!
QuestData.Description: This cannot be!$b$bMy dear brother - slain by Alliance scum!$b$bThey must be made to suffer, $r! Find a way to bring them pain! I shall not rest until it is so...$b$bFurien had been researching ancient artifacts in the eastern regions before his death. Speak to Sorrem. Perhaps he can direct you in my brother's footsteps.
QuestData.LogDescription: Cerelia wants you to speak with Sorrem at Furien's Post.
QuestData.RewardText: Furien's passing is... regrettable.$b$bI shall do all that I can to assist you in avenging his death.
